attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for the media to report scare story’s.
attributes.additional_details: Because it affects many peoples lives and there could be a more devastating impact e.g care workers or Ambulances not being able to get any or spending a lot of time waiting for fuel which puts peoples lives at risk.
attributes.background: Recently as shown by the so called ‘fuel crisis’ the media report about it and therefore causes mass panic by the population which causes a crisis that was never there. It should be either be a fineable act or illegal for the media to do this as it effects everyday people and could cause more damage

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
